title: Rivalries, Hotlines, and the EPA
teaser:
A counselor at a suicide hotline intervenes with a caller; a couple takes an online wedding contest very seriously; a woman tries to resist comparing herself  to her very fortunate sister; and the administrator for the EPA, Lisa Jackson, tells how the disaster in New Orleans shaped her as a civil servant. Hosted by Jenifer Hixson.

The Moth Radio Hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media.
contentencoded:
Brian Finkelstein is working at a suicide hot line when a caller reminds him of himself.
 
Peter Story and his wife are broke and in love and strategize on how to win an online wedding contest.
 
Diane Kastiel decides to skip a family party rather than be scrutinized.
 
Lisa Jackson explains why she decided to become an environmental engineer.

Hosted by Jenifer Hixson
